examples.example: 我用一百元买了一本很有意义的书，感觉收获满满。

translate.english: I bought a very meaningful book with one hundred yuan and felt full of gains.

examples.example: 我用一百元给妈妈买了一束鲜花，妈妈特别开心。

translate.english: I used one hundred yuan to buy a bunch of flowers for my mother, and my mother was extremely happy.

examples.example: 我用一百元请朋友吃了一顿美味的晚餐，大家都很开心。

translate.english: I spent one hundred yuan treating my friends to a delicious dinner and everyone was very happy.
